perturbation.original_text: Aduro Biotech, Inc., with a place of business at 740 Heinz Avenue, Berkeley, CA 94710 ("Aduro") and IREYA B.V having an address at Staalwijkstraat 16, 2313 XR Leiden, the Netherlands, represented by Andrea van Elsas, ("Consultant") agree to all terms and conditions of this Consulting Agreement ("Agreement") dated June 1, 2020, effective as of July 1, 2020 ("Effective Date").
perturbation.changed_text: Aduro Biotech, Inc., with a place of business at 740 Heinz Avenue, Berkeley, CA 94710 ("Aduro") and IREYA B.V having an address at Staalwijkstraat 16, 2313 XR Leiden, the Netherlands, represented by Andrea van Elsas, ("Service Provider") agree to all terms and conditions of this Consulting Agreement ("Agreement") dated June 1, 2020, effective as of July 1, 2020 ("Effective Date").
perturbation.explanation: Changing 'Consultant' to 'Service Provider' creates ambiguity as the contract primarily uses 'Consultant.' This raises uncertainty regarding which entity the terms apply to throughout the document.

perturbation.original_text: Consultant shall keep all Confidential Information confidential, and Consultant shall not disclose, disseminate, publish, reproduce or use Confidential Information except to perform the Services. If Consultant is required by judicial or administrative process to disclose Confidential Information, Consultant shall promptly notify Aduro to allow Aduro a reasonable time to oppose such process and Consultant shall reasonably cooperate in Aduro's efforts.
perturbation.changed_text: The Individual shall keep all Confidential Information confidential, and The Individual shall not disclose, disseminate, publish, reproduce or use Confidential Information except to perform the Services. If Consultant is required by judicial or administrative process to disclose Confidential Information, Consultant shall promptly notify Aduro to allow Aduro a reasonable time to oppose such process and Consultant shall reasonably cooperate in Aduro's efforts.
perturbation.explanation: Replacing 'Consultant' with 'The Individual' in the beginning of the paragraph creates ambiguity. It is unclear if 'The Individual' and 'Consultant' are the same entity. This can lead to confusion and unenforceability regarding confidentiality obligations.

perturbation.original_text: Aduro shall be the sole and exclusive owner of, and Consultant hereby assigns to Aduro, any and all writings, documents, work product, inventions, developments, improvements, discoveries, know-how, processes, chemical entities, compounds, plans, memoranda, tests, research, designs, specifications, models and data that Consultant makes, conceives, discovers or develops, either solely or jointly with any other person in performance of the Services (collectively, "Work Product"). Consultant shall promptly disclose to Aduro all information relating to Work Product as appropriate as part of the Services and at the request of Aduro.
perturbation.changed_text: Aduro shall be the sole and exclusive owner of, and Contractor hereby assigns to Aduro, any and all writings, documents, work product, inventions, developments, improvements, discoveries, know-how, processes, chemical entities, compounds, plans, memoranda, tests, research, designs, specifications, models and data that Consultant makes, conceives, discovers or develops, either solely or jointly with any other person in performance of the Services (collectively, "Work Product"). Consultant shall promptly disclose to Aduro all information relating to Work Product as appropriate as part of the Services and at the request of Aduro.
perturbation.explanation: Substituting 'Consultant' with 'Contractor' in the beginning of the paragraph creates a conflict. The paragraph then refers to what 'Consultant' makes. This could create confusion on the IP assignment and ownership. Making it unclear if 'Contractor' is the same legal entity as 'Consultant'.
